speaker: Arcanum Hall
lines: Columns carved with theorems hold up a ceiling painted with guesses.
Lecterns wait for hands and voices; chalk waits for a board it can conquer.
A brazier burns cold fire; it warms intentions, not fingers.
Wards hum behind walls like bees behind dreams.
A professor's silhouette moves on the far side of a curtain; the curtain enjoys the lecture.
On a table, a focus crystal spins when you lie.
A bell signals the start of a lesson you did not plan to attend.
The Dean's door is ajar. The training bell rings twice. The archives whisper names.

choices.text: Slip to the archives while whispers are friendly.
